system.notes: Wearer is immune to Mind-Mould, unless they are a  Psyker. Sealed, and Filtration Systems provide +40 to any Toughness Tests to resist harmful gases, and +10 to resist extreme temperatures and being set on fire. Contains separate Rebreather that lasts 5 hours before needing replacement. Cna be worn over armour. If taking 5+ damage in a singel round it becomes damaged and is no longer sealed.
